title: This Mystery Tech Has a Secret...
description: Use coupon HEYGUYS in my livestream to get $25 off your first purchase! I'll be live on September 21st at 3PM PT, come hang out!   Robo & Kala Laptop on Amazon:  Gold Dell PC on Amazon:  GlassOuse Mouse on Amazon:  Dries Depoorter Shortlife:  Ragnok Vertical FPS Mouse:  Eufy Security SmartDrop on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 The Instagram Laptop 3:28 Whatnot 4:29 McTetris 5:53 All That Glitters Isn't Gold 6:45 Not Nintendo Approved 7:49 Glassouse 10:54 The "Gold" PC 11:56 Keyboard "Switch" 12:23 I'm Counting Down 13:58 What a Device 16:13 Porch Pirates Beware
